document.full_text: will ferrell, whose comic impersonations and movie roles have established him as one of the most well-known u.s. humorists, is to receive the annual mark twain prize for american humor.
document.title: will ferrell gets top u.s. award for humor
lines_and_colors: will ferrell, whose comic impersonations and movie roles have established him as one of the most well-known u.s. humorists, is to receive the annual mark twain prize for american humor.
